Title: namshi/jose insecure JSON Web Signatures (JWS)
Description: namshi/jose allows the acceptance of unsecure JSON Web Signatures (JWS) by default. The vulnerability arises from the $allowUnsecure flag, which, when set to true during the loading of JWSes, permits tokens signed with 'none' algorithms to be processed. This behavior poses a significant security risk as it could allow an attacker to impersonate users by crafting a valid jwt token.
AffectedVersions: All versions before 1.1.2, all versions starting from 1.2.0 before 1.2.2, all versions starting from 2.0.0 before 2.0.3, all versions starting from 2.1.0 before 2.1.2
NotImpacted: All versions starting from 1.1.2 before 1.2.0, all versions starting from 1.2.2 before 2.0.0, all versions starting from 2.0.3 before 2.1.0, all versions starting from 2.1.2
